title: Remake
body: i was ingame an my team remake the game cuz i didnt connect to the game at the benning, 2/3 on votes and the game remake....

replies.body: In a team with only 3 active teammates, you only need one person to make the call to remake.  This info is available in our[ Remake guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ) as well!  Let me know if that clears things up!
